FuncDef: The display default-parameter l3vpn command displays the default L3VPN settings in L3VPN initialization.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the default label distribution mode used by a VPN instance, run the display default-parameter l3vpn command. The output of this command displays the default L3VPN settings in L3VPN initialization, even if you have modified the default L3VPN settings.
